description.zh-cn: 中国文艺理论家、红学家，曾任《人民日报》文艺部主任、海外版总编辑，是中国作家协会名誉委员和第十届全国政协委员。
description.en: Chinese literary theorist and redologist, former director of the literature and art department and editor-in-chief of the overseas edition of the People's Daily, honorary member of the China Writers Association, and member of the 10th National Committee of the CPPCC.

description.zh-cn: 中国河北省的省会和地级市。
description.en: The capital and a prefecture-level city of Hebei Province in China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会的机关报。
description.en: The official newspaper of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国各民族作家自愿结合的专业性人民团体。
description.en: A professional people's organization formed voluntarily by writers of all ethnic groups in China.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议第十届全国委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议第十届全国委员会
en: 10th National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议第十届全国委员会的任期为2003年3月至2008年3月。
description.en: The term of the 10th National Committee of the CPPCC was from March 2003 to March 2008.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国天津市的著名综合性研究型大学。
description.en: A famous comprehensive research university located in Tianjin, China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会直属事业单位，是《人民日报》的出版单位。
description.en: A public institution directly under the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, and the publisher of the People's Daily.

position.zh-cn: 文艺部主任、海外版总编辑
position.en: Director of the Literature and Art Department, Editor-in-Chief of the Overseas Edition

description.zh-cn: 丁振海曾任《人民日报》文艺部主任、海外版总编辑。
description.en: Ding Zhenhai was the former director of the literature and art department and editor-in-chief of the overseas edition of the People's Daily.
